Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. No. One -- 21 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. One Proposition
(Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. One of Grant Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twenty-one (21) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $264,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of purchasing and maintaining equipment, and the general operations of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 5 -- 11.98 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 5 of the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana (the "District") levy a special tax of eleven and ninety-eight hundredths (11.98) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $215,640 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities including equipment and fire protection apparatus and accessories and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and services for the District?
